EmailTemplate.name: CR 2.1.1b Invite to assess - reasonable adjustments
EmailTemplate.subject: Your application for the NCS Programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying to work on the 2016 NCS programmes. We are delighted to invite you to one of our group assessments - congratulations!
Booking onto an assessment
To book onto one of our group assessments you’ll need to login to the staffing website and head to the ‘Booking Assessments’ section, which should now be available to you.
https://staffing.the-challenge.org/Login.aspx?ReturnUrl=%2fsecure%2f
In this section, you can:
See a list of assessment dates ‘Register’ or ‘Decline’ dates Review details of your chosen date Request alternative assessment dates*
*Please note that we cannot always guarantee an alternative assessment date - we strongly recommend that you make every effort to be available for those listed.
Reasonable adjustments
In your application you indicated that you have a disability or condition that potentially requires adjustment at assessment. We’d like to discuss your requirements and any adjustments we can put in place to make our assessment more accessible to you.
Please call or email our staffing Inclusion team using the details below as soon as possible - we will need at least one week prior to your assessment to ensure we have everything in place.
Email: inclusion.ss@the-challenge.org
Phone: 0203 542 2451
Any questions?
If you have any difficulty booking onto assessment, or if you would like to discuss the assessment requirements please contact your local staffing team. You can also find information on our assessments on our FAQs.
We look forward to meeting you at assessment!
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
